In rerun::external::image::imageops

rerun::external::image::imageops

Function rotate90_in

pub fn rotate90_in<I, Container>(
    image: &I,
    destination: &mut ImageBuffer<<I as GenericImageView>::Pixel, Container>,
) -> Result<(), ImageError>
where
    I: GenericImageView,
    <I as GenericImageView>::Pixel: 'static,
    Container: DerefMut<Target = [<<I as GenericImageView>::Pixel as Pixel>::Subpixel]>,
Expand description

Rotate an image 90 degrees clockwise and put the result into the destination ImageBuffer.
